description:
My place is close to Flushing Meadows Park, Citifield, USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center, Laguardia & JFK Airports. You’ll love my place because of the warm decor, the ambiance, the outdoor space, and the proximity to Flushing Meadows Park (Home of the 1964 World's Fair). The parking is pretty plentiful. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Flushing Meadows Corona Park

CitiField - Home of the NY Mets

New York Hall of Science

Queens Museum

Billie Jean King National Tennis Center

Forest Hills Stadium
name: Beautiful Garden Townhouse Apt, Close to Parks.
review:
Matthew gave us a heartly welcome at arrival and he was always reachable if we had any questions.

The apartment has a high living standard, everything nice and clean. It is located in a safe area, we felt comfortable at any time. The bus stop is just a few steps from the apartment and the city can be reached easily by bus and train.

I would come back here anytime, thanks Matthew for great hospitality!

Greetings from Germany,

Michael
